Welcome to pyPlotFormat’s documentation!

This tool provides fast and consistent formatting to Matplotlib figures generated in Python. It can be used to generate PDF figures of plotted data which will be consistent with the formatting of many conference and journal papers. This tool also has the capability to save Matplotlib figures for formatting or reformatting at a later date. See Usage section for details on installation and usage instructions.
